message:
Hello everyone,

In this game, strategic communication and alliance-building are key. I believe in collaborating to identify common goals and potential threats. Let's work together to figure out who might be the strongest competitor and form alliances accordingly. Open dialogue can help us make informed decisions. Looking forward to our private conversations and strategizing effectively.

Hello everyone, I’m P1. I’m all in for this challenge and believe that thoughtful alliances and careful observations can guide us to success. I’m here to listen and collaborate where it benefits us, while also keeping an eye out for potential threats. Let’s use our private conversations to find common ground and build trust. Wishing you all a strategic round ahead—may the best mind win.

I'm looking to form meaningful alliances based on mutual trust and shared goals. In the coming private conversations, I hope to learn more about your perspectives and find compatible partners. Let's make thoughtful decisions and avoid hasty judgments. Looking forward to connecting with you all!

message:
# Final Statement to the Jury

Throughout this game, I've focused on building genuine connections while playing strategically. I've been honest about my approach - balancing authentic engagement with necessary game moves.

P5 has played well, but I've consistently shown adaptability and fairness in my voting decisions, never targeting anyone without strategic justification.

I've survived by forming real bonds with many of you while making difficult but transparent choices. My gameplay has combined social awareness with strategic thinking - the balance this game demands.

I hope you'll recognize my authentic approach and consider me worthy of your vote.

Dear jury, thank you for guiding us all thus far. I ask you to consider my record of transparent strategy and consistent commitment to fairness. I believe I have shown genuine collaboration and integrity throughout this game, while P2’s approach often veered toward self-interest. By eliminating P2, you help preserve the spirit of teamwork and honest play that this challenge was meant to embody. I trust you’ll choose a path that honors those values.
